item.title: Truck Traffic Pack by Jazzycat v3.5.8 ATS
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | July 5, 2025

Truck Traffic Pack by Jazzycat v3.5.8 ATS

Pack adds in traffic 50 new trucks:

Freightliner Argosy, Century, Classic, Coronado, Cascadia, M2
International 9200, 9400
Kenworth T440, T600, T800, T2000, K100, T880
Mack 613 Dumper, Titan, Granite
Peterbilt 378, 379, 387
Sterling 9500
Volvo VNL660
Western Star 4900
GMC Topkick C5500
CAT CT660
and some others

All standalone
Works on any maps
Compatible with all my packs
Some skins by VisualParadox
For ATS version 1.55.x

Version 3.5.8 – compatibility update for patch 1.55.x, repacked with new 1.55 SCS Game Archive Packer version (for better performance in 1.55), minor fixes and improvements

Credits: Jazzycat

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Classic Cars AI Traffic Pack by Jazzycat v9.0.8 ATS
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | July 5, 2025

Pack adds in traffic 144 new AI cars:

Chevrolet Camaro (’69, ’79, ’88), Caprice ’86, El Camino ’73, Chevelle (’67, ’70), Impala(’64, ’67, ’84), Silverado K-10 ’86, Chevy II ’66, Monte Carlo(’78, ’86), Corvair ’69, Corvette(’60, ’67, ’70), K5 Blazer ’86, Nova ’69, Astro ’88, Suburban ’86

Oldsmobile 442 ’70, Vista Cruiser ’72, Delta 88 ’73, Cutlass Supreme Classic ’88

Plymouth Barracuda ’68, GTX ’71, Volare ’79, Road Runner ’69, Belvedere ’66, Fury ’69, Valiant ’62, Satellite ’66, Duster ’71
Mercury Cougar ’70, Grand Marquis ’86, Cyclone ’70

Lincoln Continental ’62
GMC Sierra 1500 ’88, Syclone, Typhoon

AMC Pacer, Javelin ’71, Gremlin ’73, Hornet ’74, Rebel

AC Cobra

Datsun 510 ’70, 240Z
Subaru BRAT ’81, Legacy ’89

Toyota 4Runner ’90, Corolla AE86, Celica ’70, 2000GT, Celica Supra ’84

MG MGA, MGB GT
Saab 99
Triumph TR3, TR6

Jaguar XK120, XK150, XK-E
Ferrari Daytona, Testarossa, 288 GTO, 250 GT California Spyder
Porsche 911(’73, ’82), 914
Volkswagen Beetle ’63, Type 2(T1), Rabbit
Aston Martin V8 Vantage ’77, DB4 GT, DB5 Vantage, DBS V8
Alfa Romeo Spider ’86
Lamborghini 350 GT
Maserati 3500 GT
Volvo 242
BMW E28
Mercedes-Benz 300SEL ’72, 300SL ’57, 190

All standalone, works on any maps.
Compatible with all my packs.
For ATS version 1.55.x

Version 9.0.8 – compatibility update for patch 1.55.x, repacked with new 1.55 SCS Game Archive Packer version (for better performance in 1.55), minor fixes and improvements

Credits: Jazzycat

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

item.title: Sport Cars Traffic Pack by TrafficManiac v12.7.10 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | July 5, 2025

Sport Cars Traffic Pack by TrafficManiac v12.7.10 ETS2

Pack adds in traffic 261 sport and super cars:

9ff GT9
AC 378 GT Zagato

Fiat Coupe, Barchetta, 124 Spider ’17
Fisker Karma

Genty Akylone
Ginetta F400
GTA Spano
Gumpert Apollo N

HTT Plethore LC-750

Kepler Motion
Koenigsegg One:1, CCXR, Regera, CC8S, Gemera
Lamborghini Gallardo, Diablo, Veneno, Aventador, Centenario, Murcielago, Reventon, Countach
Lexus LFA, SC430, LC 500, RC F
Lotus Exige S Roadster, Evora, Elise(’99, ’05, ’17), Exige ’06, Espirit ’02, Evija
Lucra L148
Maserati Gransport, GranTurismo, MC12, Spyder
Mazda RX-7, RX-8, MX-5(’94, ’01, ’07, ’15)
Mazzanti Evantra
Mercedes-Benz SLS AMG GT, SLK(R171, R172), SL(R230, R231), SLR McLaren Roadster, AMG GTR, CLK63 AMG, CL55 AMG, CLK GTR, 190 Evo II
McLaren 570s, P1, 720S, F1, 12C, 675LT, Senna
Mitsubishi Eclipse(’95, ’03, ’12), Lancer Evo(III, IV, V, VI, VII, VIII, IX, X), Starion, 3000GT, FTO
Morgan Aero SuperSports
Mosler MT900
Nio EP9
Nissan GT-R, 350Z, 370Z, Z
Noble M600, M12
Onuk Sazan
Opel Speedster
Pagani Huayra, Zonda
Peugeot RCZ
Pininfarina Battista
Porsche 911(993, 996 GT2, 997, 992), 718 Boxster, Carrera GT, Cayman(981, 987), 959, 944, 918, 968
Renault Clio V6
Rezvani Beast Alpha
Rimac Concept One, C Two
Rossion Q1
Ruf CTR3, 3800S, SCR
Savage Rivale Roadyacht
Sbarro Alcador
Scuderia Cameron Glickenhaus SCG003
Spada Vetture Sport Codatronca
Spyker C8 Aileron, C12 Zagato
SSC Ultimate Aero
Subaru Impreza WRX STI(GM, GD, GH, GV), BRZ GT
Suzuki Swift Sport
Toyota GT86, Celica(’92, ’94, ’03), Supra(’92, ’98, ’19), MR2(’89, ’95, Roadster)
Tushek TS900 Apex
TVR Sagaris, Tuscan, Typhon
Ultima GTR
Vauxhall Monaro, VX220
Vencer Sarthe
W Motors Fenyr Supersport, Lykan Hypersport
Wiesmann MF3, GT MF5
Zenvo ST1

All standalone.
Works on any maps.
Compatible with AI packs by Jazzycat.
For version 1.54.x
Included two versions: for use only with default traffic and for use with Jazzycats AI pack.
You must have in mod folder two files:
sport_cars_traffic_pack_by_TrafficManiac_base.scs
and
sport_cars_traffic_pack_by_TrafficManiac_def.scs (only with default traffic)
or
sport_cars_traffic_pack_by_TrafficManiac_jaz.scs (with Jazzycats AI pack)
If you want to have many sport cars everywhere use only one file:
sport_cars_traffic_pack_by_TrafficManiac_base.scs

Version 12.7.10 – mod packed with new version of SCS Packer 1.55 (improving performance), fixed problems with some lods

Credits: TrafficManiac

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Emergency Traffic Pack v1.2.13 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | July 5, 2025

Emergency Traffic Pack v1.2.13 ETS2

Mod adds to traffic emergency vehicles (Mercedes-Benz Vito, Fiat Ducato, Nissan Pathfinder, Skoda Octavia, Mercedes-Benz Sprinter) in 39 countries: Finland, Albania, Estonia, Russia, Slovakia, Austria, Slovenia, France, Germany, Moldova, Spain, Sweden, UK, Ukraine, Switzerland, Greece, Belgium, Bulgaria, Hungary, Iceland, Croatia, Czech Republic, Italy, Latvia, Netherlands, Norway, Denmark, Liechtenstein, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Turkey, Tunisia, Algeria, Morocco, Libya, Egypt.
All standalone.
Works on any maps.
Compatible with other traffic mods.
For game version 1.55.x
Some skins by Solaris36

Version 1.2.13 – mod packed with new version of SCS Packer 1.55 (improving performance), fixed wheel 3d model
